members.name: Max Mustermann
members.description: Max Mustermann is the founder and CEO of Company X. He has many years of experience in software development and specializes in the development of web applications and mobile applications.

members.name: Erika Musterfrau
members.description: Erika Musterfrau is the head of the development team at Company X. She has extensive experience in software development and specializes in the development of web applications and mobile applications.
